name: A Tour of Goose Pimplelopolis
description:
Welcome to Goose Pimplelopolis! Use WASD or the arrow buttons to move, the mouse to look around, and the spacebar to jump. If you collect all 22 brains, 33 frogs, and 44 keebles something special will happen!

Features artwork by Ro Rushton-Green, Lisel Joseph, Ben Mark, and Ellie Tremayne. All of the music used in this game can be found at https://goosepimple.bandcamp.com/. Thanks for listening / playing!
